**Story**

At the center of the universe sits a star that is the big mega king that keeps the universe flowing. It is dying, the universe is fracturing, and in the process of dying it spat out our protagonist (a solar flare) all the way across the universe. The flare will journey through 7 stages all the way back to the center, where it will fight the final boss and bring stability back to the universe.

**Ideas**

Kiegan brought up a very interesting idea about what if the flare has to make decisions (like red dead redemption 2\) that affect the outcome of the game. So there would be 5 endings: Pure Good, Good, Balanced (true ending), Bad, and Very Bad. Our character would make decisions such as killing or sparing certain NPCs, choosing to upgrade their cards either through good or evil upgrades, and stuff like that. After each final boss the player will choose whether to upgrade a single card to a Radiant Card (good) or a Cursed Card (Evil). Radiant Cards offer solid buffs with little or no risk, Cursed cards offer huge benefits with huge risk. To obtain the true ending the player must gather all 7 fragments (colors of the rainbow symbolizing balance) while maintaining a balanced deck (equal number Radiant and Cursed cards). The other endings will depend on the ratio of the types of cards (All radiant is pure good, mostly radiant is good, mostly cursed is bad, all cursed is evil ending.)

To incentivize the player to not always go for the OP cursed cards i thought it would make sense to pretty much ensure that a fully cursed or a mostly cursed deck will be glass cannon-esque so very strong but very hard to stay alive so like more damage taken, turns your hearts to perma loss, high cost or slow cooldowns. On the other hand, Radiant Cards should be useful enough to be able to palpably achieve the ending without too much trouble.

I have the 5 ending cutscenes mapped out in my head i will add onto this later

**Gameplay and Mechanics**

![][image1]

Cards will have an assigned flare value needed to use  
The meter fills on a timer adding a flare value (can be adjusted with cards)  
Player will have a set of like 10 cards that get reshuffled with every use its like clash royale in a way  
A shop will be available in every stage somewhere, its a wandering comet and will have 4 cards (radiant, cursed basic) and some consumables that like permanent buffs that can increase heart count, lower time meter  
At the end of every stage will be a boss. (i.e. asteroid belt that's like those snake bosses where you have to shoot their head and avoid)  
At the end of every stage the player will choose to upgrade a card to either Radiant or Cursed  
Dungeon Crawler Roguelike, think binding of isaac

**Artistic Choices**

As another fun way to track whether they are good or evil the color palette will Hue Shift (same saturation and everything just a different hue) depending on what ending they are aligned with at the moment.
